verses.plain: The king’s heart is in the hand of the LORD, as the rivers of water: he turneth it whithersoever he will.

tokens.t: The king’s heart
in the hand of the
the rivers of water: he turneth it whithersoever he will.

verses.plain: Every way of a man is right in his own eyes: but the LORD pondereth the hearts.

tokens.t: Every way of a man
right in his own eyes: but the
pondereth the hearts.

verses.plain: To do justice and judgment is more acceptable to the LORD than sacrifice.

tokens.t: To do justice and judgment
more acceptable to the
than sacrifice.

verses.plain: An high look, and a proud heart, and the plowing of the wicked, is sin.

tokens.t: An high look, and a proud heart,
the plowing of the wicked,
sin.

verses.plain: The thoughts of the diligent tend only to plenteousness; but of every one that is hasty only to want.

tokens.t: The thoughts of the diligent
only to plenteousness; but of every one
hasty only to want.

verses.plain: The getting of treasures by a lying tongue is a vanity tossed to and fro of them that seek death.

tokens.t: The getting of treasures by a lying tongue
a vanity tossed to and fro of them that seek death.

verses.plain: The robbery of the wicked shall destroy them; because they refuse to do judgment.

tokens.t: The robbery of the wicked shall destroy them; because they refuse to do judgment.

verses.plain: The way of man is froward and strange: but as for the pure, his work is right.

tokens.t: The way of man
froward and strange: but
the pure, his work
right.

verses.plain: It is better to dwell in a corner of the housetop, than with a brawling woman in a wide house.

tokens.t: better to dwell in a corner of the housetop, than with a brawling woman in a wide house.

verses.plain: The soul of the wicked desireth evil: his neighbour findeth no favour in his eyes.

tokens.t: The soul of the wicked desireth evil: his neighbour findeth no favour in his eyes.

verses.plain: When the scorner is punished, the simple is made wise: and when the wise is instructed, he receiveth knowledge.

tokens.t: When the scorner is punished, the simple is made wise: and when the wise is instructed, he receiveth knowledge.

verses.plain: The righteous man wisely considereth the house of the wicked: but God overthroweth the wicked for their wickedness.

tokens.t: The righteous
wisely considereth the house of the wicked:
overthroweth the wicked for
wickedness.

verses.plain: Whoso stoppeth his ears at the cry of the poor, he also shall cry himself, but shall not be heard.

tokens.t: Whoso stoppeth his ears at the cry of the poor, he also shall cry himself, but shall not be heard.

verses.plain: A gift in secret pacifieth anger: and a reward in the bosom strong wrath.

tokens.t: A gift in secret pacifieth anger: and a reward in the bosom strong wrath.

verses.plain: It is joy to the just to do judgment: but destruction shall be to the workers of iniquity.

tokens.t: joy to the just to do judgment: but destruction
to the workers of iniquity.

verses.plain: The man that wandereth out of the way of understanding shall remain in the congregation of the dead.

tokens.t: The man that wandereth out of the way of understanding shall remain in the congregation of the dead.

verses.plain: He that loveth pleasure shall be a poor man: he that loveth wine and oil shall not be rich.

tokens.t: He that loveth pleasure
a poor man: he that loveth wine and oil shall not be rich.

verses.plain: The wicked shall be a ransom for the righteous, and the transgressor for the upright.

tokens.t: The wicked
a ransom for the righteous, and the transgressor for the upright.

verses.plain: It is better to dwell in the wilderness, than with a contentious and an angry woman.

tokens.t: better to dwell in the wilderness, than with a contentious and an angry woman.

verses.plain: There is treasure to be desired and oil in the dwelling of the wise; but a foolish man spendeth it up.

tokens.t: treasure to be desired and oil in the dwelling of the wise; but a foolish man spendeth it up.

verses.plain: He that followeth after righteousness and mercy findeth life, righteousness, and honour.

tokens.t: He that followeth after righteousness and mercy findeth life, righteousness, and honour.

verses.plain: A wise man scaleth the city of the mighty, and casteth down the strength of the confidence thereof.

tokens.t: A wise
scaleth the city of the mighty, and casteth down the strength of the confidence thereof.

verses.plain: Whoso keepeth his mouth and his tongue keepeth his soul from troubles.

tokens.t: Whoso keepeth his mouth and his tongue keepeth his soul from troubles.

verses.plain: Proud and haughty scorner is his name, who dealeth in proud wrath.

tokens.t: Proud
haughty scorner
his name, who dealeth in proud wrath.

verses.plain: The desire of the slothful killeth him; for his hands refuse to labour.

tokens.t: The desire of the slothful killeth him; for his hands refuse to labour.

verses.plain: He coveteth greedily all the day long: but the righteous giveth and spareth not.

tokens.t: He coveteth greedily all the day long: but the righteous giveth and spareth not.

verses.plain: The sacrifice of the wicked is abomination: how much more, when he bringeth it with a wicked mind?

tokens.t: The sacrifice of the wicked
abomination: how much more,
he bringeth it with a wicked mind?

verses.plain: A false witness shall perish: but the man that heareth speaketh constantly.

tokens.t: A false witness shall perish: but the man that heareth speaketh constantly.

verses.plain: A wicked man hardeneth his face: but as for the upright, he directeth his way.

tokens.t: A wicked man hardeneth his face: but
the upright, he directeth his way.

verses.plain: There is no wisdom nor understanding nor counsel against the LORD.

tokens.t: no wisdom nor understanding nor counsel against the

verses.plain: The horse is prepared against the day of battle: but safety is of the LORD.

tokens.t: The horse
prepared against the day of battle: but safety
of the

footnotes.text: destroy…: Heb. saw them, or, dwell with them
a brawling…: Heb. a woman of contentions
a wide…: Heb. an house of society
in…: Heb. in the land of the desert
in proud…: Heb. in the wrath of pride
A…: Heb. A witness of lies
